Essential protection for your loved ones.

Personal Sentinel V3 Plus Takaful

Personal Sentinel Version 3 Plus Takaful is a yearly renewable personal accident coverage plan that adheres to Islamic Shariah laws. This plan provides financial security in the event of bodily injuries, disablement or death caused solely and directly by an unforeseen event. From individual protection to group coverage this plan ensures financial stability and protection of your loved ones, whether they are your partners, family members or employees with their families.
All in one complete personal accident protection plan.

Z-Drive Assist Takaful

Drive with confidence on the road with Z-Driver Assist Takaful. This renewable motor takaful plan provides 24/7 Roadside Assistance for your vehicle and even Flood Protection & Personal Accident Benefits for the driver and passengers of the Vehicle.
Protects you and your loved ones on the road.

Z-Driver Takaful – Car Takaful Plan

The Z-Driver takaful is Shariah-compliant comprehensive motor takaful, that provides coverage for your vehicle, your family, and you in the event of a car accident. It comes with SUPER VALUE add-ons that you can add to get more benefits and discounts.

Z-Rider Takaful – Motorcycle Takaful Plan

Z-Rider Takaful is a basic motor takaful plan designed for motorcycle riders. This Plan offers lower contribution rates to safer riders, provides coverage for motorcycle riders and pillion passengers.
